entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView with Grouping Generates UICollectionView "attempting to apply nil layout attributes to view" on iOS #15862
  • .Net Maui 7 and 8 Preview Android Performing a full GC + Crash Collection View Back Forward #15860
  • Frame does not support BorderWidth #15851
  • [MAUI with .NET 8] Can't run on Android/iOS #15849
  • Entry fields do not work correctly if bound to a numeric property from a ViewModel #15846
    Backlog

Closed

  • Collection View Header and Empty View not showing on Android when ItemSource is null #8934
    .NET 8
  • Padding: Error Cannot convert value "10 12" to "Microsoft.Maui.Thickness" #15852
  • [Android] Crash binding the CarouselView CurrentItem #13084
    Backlog
  • Android.Util.AndroidRuntimeException: Only the original thread that created a view hierarchy can touch its views. #14128
    Backlog
  • My CPU is AMD #15839
  • [Enhancement] Introduce an AppThemeColor #2597
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix PointerGesture CommandParameter properties #15863
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Add note to Colors.xaml to make people aware of Android specific colors #15855
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄

Merged

  • Optimize iOS selection synchronization #14613
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Correctly identify headers/footers when using UngroupedItemsSource #15688
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [ios] fix memory leak in CollectionView cells #15831
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • [uitests] Fix uitests pipelines triggers for Compatibility tests #15830
    area/testing
  • Skip the compatibility warning #15854
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #15853
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Split daily code formatting check in 2: .NET 7 branch and main branch #15791
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15845
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Streamline ModalNavigation lifecycle events #15799
    area/navigation 🧭, area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮
  • Android ecosytem updates #15399
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #15656
    community ✨
  • [android] improve performance of `Entry.MaxLength` #15614
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [CI] Remove nested templates in the running steps. #15797
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Backport WinUI DeviceTest Fixes #15840
    area/testing
  • Add logic to set DefaultLabelPosition on the WinUI CommandBar #15835
    platform/windows 🪟, area/toolbar
  • Windows Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • Publish ControlGallery to run tests #15194
    area/testing
  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Use base Width and Height on Android PlatformGraphicsView #15721
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Fix CharacterSpacing on SearchBar on iOS to be actually set #15596
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [essentials] ensure WebUtils.ParseQueryString captures fragment parameters #15662
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue setting ContentPage gradient background #15832
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
